Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:

ccn_buf_decoder

ccn_closureHandle for upcalls that allow clients receive notifications of incoming interests and content
ccn_dict
ccn_dict_entry
ccn_face_instance
ccn_forwardingKeeps track of the faces that interests matching a given name prefix may be forwarded to

ccn_socketsHolds a pair of socket file descriptors
ccn_timeval
ccn_upcall_infoAdditional information provided in the upcall
ccnd_handleWe pass this handle almost everywhere within ccnd
content_entryThe content hash table is keyed by the initial portion of the ContentObject that contains all the parts of the complete name
content_queue
faceOne of our active faces
hashtb_enumerator
hashtb_param
MP_info_st
nameprefix_entryThe nameprefix hash table is keyed by the Component elements of the Name prefix
propagating_entryThe propagating interest hash table is keyed by Nonce
sparse_straggler_entryThe sparse_straggler hash table, keyed by accession, holds scattered entries that would otherwise bloat the direct content_by_accession table
